visual.name: Drill_Down_Scatter_PRO_By_ZoomCharts
visual.displayName: Drill Down Scatter PRO (Filter) by ZoomCharts
visual.description: Drill Down Scatter PRO (Filter) by ZoomCharts

dataRoles.name: sourceNodes
dataRoles.description: The X positions of the data points. Blank values will be ignored.

dataRoles.name: targetNodes
dataRoles.description: The Y positions of the data points. Blank values will be ignored.
Data points are plotted for values in this field. Add multiple columns to create a drill-down hierarchy.
dataRoles.name: category

dataRoles.description: The categorical field for color and shape.
dataRoles.name: legend
nodeName
dataRoles.description: The textual label to be displayed for each data point.

dataRoles.name: nodeValue
dataRoles.description: The numeric label to be displayed for each data point.
Apply a color (color name or hex value) to each data point. Color Mode needs to be set to 'Dynamic' for the data point under Data Points (Default) or the respective Data Point Group.
dataRoles.name: nodeColor

dataRoles.description: Change the shape of the data point. Accepted values: Circle, Rectangle, Droplet, Rhombus, and Diamond. Marker Shape needs to be set to 'Dynamic' for the data point under Data Points (Default) or the respective Data Point Group.
dataRoles.name: nodeShape

dataRoles.description: Field for marker images. Supported are Base64 encoded strings (starts with data:image/;base64).
dataRoles.name: nodeImage
nodeSettingsCategory
dataRoles.description: Groups allow specifying different styles, such as color, shape, image, and label settings, for groups of data points. Accepted values: 'Group' or 'group' followed by a number (1-9), for example, 'group1'.
Add additional data to be displayed in tooltips when markers are hovered or right-clicked.
dataRoles.name: tooltipFields

trialLicense.description: Currently, this block is meant to be hidden.

info.description: Turn off to hide the info button. The info button can only be removed if a paid license is detected.

preview.description: Hidden field, only enabling it from a theme to allow some functionallity.

autoZoomSize.description: What percentage of the chart width/height is added as a margin when zooming.

fontSize.description: Font Size can be in px or pt, depending on the setting selected in Advanced Settings -> Font Size Unit.

useFixedAspectRatio.description: Fix the X and Y axis aspect ratio to 1.

fontSize.description: Font Size can be in px or pt, depending on the setting selected in Advanced Settings -> Font Size Unit.

titleFontSize.description: Font Size can be in px or pt, depending on the setting selected in Advanced Settings -> Font Size Unit.

valueType.description: Display values as numbers or percentages.

percentageDecimal.description: Set the number of decimals for percentages.

showValueAffixes.description: Whether to use affixes or not (e.g. currency)

valueAxisX.description: Settings used for the X axis

fontSize.description: Font Size can be in px or pt, depending on the setting selected in Advanced Settings -> Font Size Unit.

titleFontSize.description: Font Size can be in px or pt, depending on the setting selected in Advanced Settings -> Font Size Unit.

valueType.description: Display values as numbers or percentages.

percentageDecimal.description: Set the number of decimals for percentages.

showValueAffixes.description: Whether to use affixes or not (e.g. currency)

valueAxisY.description: Settings used for the Y axis

fontSize.description: Font Size can be in px or pt, depending on the setting selected in Advanced Settings -> Font Size Unit.

titleFontSize.description: Font Size can be in px or pt, depending on the setting selected in Advanced Settings -> Font Size Unit.

valueType.description: Display values as numbers or percentages.

percentageDecimal.description: Set the number of decimals for percentages.

showValueAffixes.description: Whether to use affixes or not (e.g. currency)

delta.description: Displays the delta - the difference between the Y value of the data point and the respective value on the regression line - when a data point is hovered.

parameters.description: Displays the parameters of the regression equation (a0, a1, etc.)

x.description: Displays the X value at the hovered point.

y.description: Displays the Y value at the hovered point.

ar2.description: Displays the adjusted coefficient of determination (R²)

thresholdLineValue1.description: Numerical value, which can be either whole number or decimal number. Decimal number is "." separated. Examples: 5 or 5.0 or 5.5

thresholdAreaFrom1.description: Numerical value, which can be either whole number or decimal number. Decimal number is "." separated. Examples: 5 or 5.0 or 5.5

thresholdAreaTo1.description: Numerical value, which can be either whole number or decimal number. Decimal number is "." separated. Examples: 5 or 5.0 or 5.5

thresholdValueAxis1.description: The value axis linked to the series.

showThresholdLabel1.description: Whether to display a threshold label

thresholdLabelxPadding1.description: How many pixels the label should be offset from the edge

thresholdLabelyPadding1.description: How many pixels the label should be offset from the threshold

thresholdLabelDecimals1.description: Set number of decimals for values

nodes.description: Settings used for all data points by default.

shape.description: Set the default marker shape (for data points not belonging to a data point group). Dynamic - uses the shape specified in the Marker Shape field. If no shape is specified, circle is used.

showImages.description: Display images supplied in the Marker Image field.

colorMode.description: Dynamic - the color from Marker Color field will be used. Auto - assign theme colors automatically. Fixed - choose a single color. No Fill - no fill color.

dynamicFillColor.description: This color will be used for markers that do not have marker color specified in the data.

minVisibleSize.description: The smallest size a marker will be drawn, 0 - automatic.

maxVisibleSize.description: The largest size a marker will be drawn, 0 - automatic.

minRadius.description: As node radius is calculated based on it's value, you can limit node size by using 'Min Marker Radius' together with 'Max Marker Radius'. 0 means no limit.

valueType.description: Whether to display values as numbers or percentages.

percentageDecimal.description: Set the number of decimals for percentages.

useCategoryAsLabel.description: Use categories or legend as labels. Legend data is used if 'Categories' field is not populated, but 'Legend' is.

nodeDetailMinSize.description: Minimum marker size at which marker details, such as labels and images, are displayed.

nodeDetailMinZoom.description: Minimum zoom level at which marker details, such as labels and images, are displayed.

shouldDrawOverlappingLabels.description: Whether to draw data point labels when they overlap with other labels.

fontSizeMode.description: Auto - font size is adjusted automatically based on zoom. Fixed - set a fixed font size that does not change with zoom.

fontSize.description: Font Size can be in px or pt, depending on the setting selected in Advanced Settings -> Font Size Unit.

fontSizeMode.description: Auto - font size is adjusted automatically based on zoom. Fixed - set a fixed font size that does not change with zoom.

fontSize.description: Font Size can be in px or pt, depending on the setting selected in Advanced Settings -> Font Size Unit.

urlLength.description: Shorten hyperlinks supplied in the Tooltips field for better aesthetics.

category1.description: Enable or disable customization of Data Point Group #1

shape.description: Set the marker shape for data points belonging to this group. Dynamic - uses the shape specified in the Marker Shape field. If no shape is specified, the Marker Shape selected under Data Points (Default) is used.

showImages.description: Display images supplied in the Marker Image field.

colorMode.description: Dynamic - the color from Marker Color field will be used. Auto - assign theme colors automatically. Fixed - choose a single color. No Fill - no fill color.

dynamicFillColor.description: This color will be used for markers that do not have marker color specified in the data.

minRadius.description: As marker radius is calculated based on it's value, you can limit marker size by using 'Min Marker Radius' together with 'Max Marker Radius'. If 'Max Marker Radius' is set larger than 'Min Marker Radius' you will get reverse behavior.

valueType.description: Whether to display values as numbers or percentages.

percentageDecimal.description: Set the number of decimals for percentages.

useCategoryAsLabel.description: Use categories or legend as labels. Legend data is used if 'Categories' field is not populated, but 'Legend' is.

category2.description: Enable or disable customization of Data Point Group #2

shape.description: Set the marker shape for data points belonging to this group. Dynamic - uses the shape specified in the Marker Shape field. If no shape is specified, the Marker Shape selected under Data Points (Default) is used.
